data.name: Drop Dead: Dual Strike Edition
data.description:
** Enhanced for Meta Quest 3 **

IMMERSIVE ADVENTURE
Experience a thrilling FPS action adventure story told across three chapters.

You're the last agent alive able to stop Dr Monday and save the world! Slay the zombie hordes using a high-tech visor, insane gadgets & an arsenal of Z-shredding weapons.

Team up with former CIA operative Billy-Bob and his daughter Celia-Jane as you delve deep into the true madness of Dr Monday’s nefarious schemes of world domination!

HACK & SLASH
Alongside impressive firepower, get up close and personal with the zombie horde with melee weapons! Hack off limbs & hurl axes at the shuffling undead. Deflect spitter slime with baseball bats & hit a zombie head for a home run!

DUAL-WIELD WEAPONS
Wield two weapons at once. Double the firepower, double the damage!

EXCITING MULTIPLAYER
Team up with a friend in horde mode & hold back the undead together! 

NOT BOOTING?
Update your Oculus device firmware / ensure your device storage is not full

JOIN THE COMMUNITY DISCORD:
Soulassembly.com/discord-dd

translations.long_description:
SUMÉRGETE EN LA AVENTURA
Experimenta una historia emocionante contada en tres capítulos.

MACHETAZOS Y TAJOS
¡Entabla  con las hordas de zombis usando las nuevas armas cuerpo a cuerpo!

ARMAS CUERPO A CUERPO
En Drop Dead Dual Strike, puedes blandir dos armas a la vez. ¡A mayor potencia de fuego, mayor daño!

MULTIJUGADOR EMOCIONANTE
¡Únete a un amigo en el modo horda y retened juntos a los muertos vivientes!

DAÑO ESQUIVATORIO
Gracias a los seis grados de movimiento del Quest, puedes agacharte y esquivar para evitar los escupitajos de cieno y los ataques de cohetes.

NUEVO MODO ARENA HORDA
Junto con los modos originales arena horda, pon a prueba tu valor en El enfrentamiento definitivo.

MODO HORDA BRUTAL
Pon a prueba tu entereza en el modo horda en cuatro arenas separadas.

CÓMPRALO EN RIFT, JUEGA EN QUEST
Rift te dará una copia gratuita para el nuevo Oculus Quest. También tiene cross-play entre el Rift y el Quest.
translations.short_description:
La experiencia arcade zombi definitiva...

¡3 líneas temporales épicas! 

¡Enfréntate a las hordas en solitario o con amigos!

Más de 40 misiones llenas de acción, con armas destructivas y jugabilidad increíble.

keywords: シューティングゲーム
translations.long_description:
冒険に没入
"3つのチャプターで語られるスリリングなストーリーが展開。

ハック&スラッシュ
強烈な火器を使いこなし、さらに新登場の近接武器でゾンビに接近戦を挑もう！敵の肉体を切り裂き、アンデッド共に斧を投げつけろ。野球バットでスライムを撃ち返し、ゾンビの頭をホームラン！もちろん他にも多くの武器が登場！ 

武器二刀流
Drop Dead Dual Strikeでは、2つの武器を同時に使えるようになっています。火力2倍、ダメージも2倍！

興奮のマルチプレイ
大群モードで友達と協力して、アンデットを撃退しよう！柔軟に戦略を作り出し、友達が火力を必要としていたら武器を投げて渡すといった行動も可能です。お互いの背中を任せ、ゾンビを粉砕せよ！

ダメージを回避
Questの6段階の移動により、かがむ、沈み込む、回避、飛び込むことなどで、分裂するスライムやロケット攻撃をかわすことができます。

過酷な大群モード
4つの異なるアリーナの大群モードでゾンビ共を蹴散らそう。一人または仲間と一緒に、どんどん手強くなっていくアンデッドの群れを押し返せ。君には生き延びられるだけの力があるか？

QUESTで購入、RIFTでプレイ
Questで『Drop Dead』を購入すると、Oculus Rift用の無料ソフトも取得します。RiftとQuestでのクロスプレイもサポートされており、ゾンビを倒すパートナーを見つけやすくなっています！
translations.short_description:
「究極のゾンビシューティング体験...

3つの時間軸で繰り広げられる壮大な戦い！ 

ソロ&協力での大群撃退モード！

40を超えるアクション満載のミッション、強力な武器、最高のゲーム体験.

translations.long_description:
PLONGEZ AU CŒUR DE L'AVENTURE
Découvrez une histoire passionnante racontée à travers trois chapitres.

UN PUR HACK 'N' SLASH
En plus de votre incroyable puissance de feu, vous pourrez compter sur de nouvelles armes de mêlée pour vous rapprocher de la horde de zombies! 

UTILISEZ DEUX ARMES À LA FOIS
Vous pourrez désormais manier deux armes en même temps. Deux fois plus de dégâts!

UN MODE MULTIJOUEUR CAPTIVANT
Faites équipe avec un ami en mode Horde et affrontez les zombies ensemble!

ESQUIVEZ LES COUPS
Grâce aux six degrés de liberté de l'Oculus Quest, vous pouvez vous accroupir, vous baisser, esquiver et plonger pour éviter la salive de zombie et les attaques de missiles.

TOUTE LA VIOLENCE DU MODE HORDE
Testez votre courage dans le mode Horde à travers quatre arènes distinctes, en solo ou avec l'aide d'un ami.

ACHETEZ LE JEU SUR QUEST, JOUEZ SUR RIFT
Si vous achetez Drop Dead sur l'Oculus Quest, vous recevrez également un exemplaire gratuit pour l'Oculus Rift.
translations.short_description:
Le jeu de zombie arcade ultime...

3 chronologies épiques! 

Un mode Solo et Coopératif!

Plus de 40 missions bourrées d'action, des armes dévastatrices et une jouabilité fantastique.

translations.long_description:
TAUCHE IN EIN ABENTEUER EIN
Erlebe eine spannende Geschichte, die in drei Kapiteln erzählt wird.

HACK & SLASH
Neben beeindruckender Feuerkraft kann man sich den Zombie-Horden dank brandneuer Nahkampfwaffen auch näher vorstellen!

AKIMBO-WAFFEN
Bei Drop Dead Dual Strike kann man zwei Waffen gleichzeitig nutzen. Doppelte Feuerkraft, doppelter Schaden!

AUFREGENDER MULTIPLAYER
Bilde im Horden-Modus zusammen mit einem Freund ein Team, um die Untoten gemeinsam aufzuhalten!

VERMEIDE SCHADEN
Dank der Sechs-Grad-Bewegung des Quest kannst du den Schleim von Speiern sowie Raketenangriffe durch gekonnte Ausweichbewegungen vermeiden.

BRUTALER HORDEN-MODUS
Teste deinen Mut im Horden-Modus in vier separaten Arenen. Bestehe gegen zunehmend herausfordernde Wellen an Untoten, entweder allein oder mit einem Freund.

KAUFE AUF QUEST, SPIELE AUF RIFT
Wenn du Drop Dead auf Quest kaufst, erhältst du eine kostenlose Version für die Oculus Rift. Gemeinsames Spielen auf Rift und Quest wird auch unterstützt!
translations.short_description:
Das ultimative Zombie-Arcade-Erlebnis...

3 epische Zeitlinien! 

Horden-Modus für Einzelspieler und Koop!

Mehr als 40 actiongeladene Missionen mit verheerenden Waffen und genialem Gameplay.

translations.long_description:
빠져드는 모험
세 개의 챕터에서 흥미진진한 이야기가 펼쳐집니다.

핵 앤 슬래시
화끈한 총기와 더불어, 새로운 근접 무기들로 더 박력 있게 좀비들을 쓸어버리세요! 팔다리를 자르고 도끼를 집어 던지며, 야구방망이로 좀비의 타액을 쳐내고 머리통을 홈런 치듯 후려치세요! 그 외에도 다양한 무기들이 준비되어 있습니다. 

쌍수 무기
Drop Dead Dual Strike 업데이트로, 이제 두 개의 무기를 동시에 쥘 수 있습니다. 화력이 두 배, 화끈함도 두 배입니다!

흥미진진한 멀티 플레이
호드 모드에서 친구들과 함께 언데드들을 소탕하세요! 창의력을 발휘해 독특한 전략을 세우고, 화력이 필요한 친구에게 무기를 던져주세요. 서로 등을 맞대고 싸우는 난전이 시작됩니다!

공격 회피
Quest의 6축 기능을 사용해, 몸을 숙이고 웅크리고 내던지며 적의 타액과 로켓 공격을 피할 수 있습니다.

치열한 호드 모드
4개의 아레나에서 호드 모드에 도전해 실력을 테스트하세요. 점점 더 거세지는 공격을 혼자, 또는 친구와 함께 버텨야 합니다. 과연 당신은 살아남을 수 있을까요?

QUEST용으로 구매하여 RIFT에서 플레이
Drop Dead의 Quest 버전을 구매하면 Oculus Rift 버전을 무료로 드립니다. Rift와 Quest의 크로스 플레이도 지원되어, 함께 좀비를 사냥할 파트너를 더 쉽게 찾을 수 있습니다!
translations.short_description:
최고의 좀비 아케이드 게임...

3개의 웅장한 타임라인! 

솔로 및 협동 생존 모드!

40가지 이상의 폭발적인 미션과 파괴적인 무기, 멋진 게임 플레이를 선사합니다.

changelog.change_log:
Enabled HD Scenes for Q2, QPro and Q3.
Quest 3 runs on 90HZ with stable 90 FPS
Q2 is at 72Hz but with HD scenes
Fixed avatars positioning 
Includes general polish and bug fixes

Removed Xmas event
Added improved news/info support

Megaboomer icon no longer locks if dropped in error state
Zombies no longer soft lock the game if they get stuck
Seasonal event enabled (Christmas hat mode implemented)
Megaboomer tutorial fixes
Localization additions
Fixed an issue where denying microphone permission caused MP to black screen.

New Update!

Featuring a new weapon & voice command.

Mega Boomer!

- A brand new weapon. Grab it, hold down the trigger and shout 'MEGA BOOM' to activate a sonic blast.

Now available on Quest Pro

- We're pleased to announce that Drop Dead: Dualstrike is now playable on the Quest Pro!

A new update is here!

We've added some new in-game settings to allow users more choice on how they play the game from a reloading perspective. The new setting allow players the option to disable gun jamming. We've also added an option to switch active reload from trigger to X/A.

Issues we've fixed: 

- We have fixed an issue that caused connection problems when joining a lobby on Rift for the first time
- We have fixed an issue that sometimes caused a black screen/three dot issue when joining a multiplayer lobby
- We have fixed an issue where existing weapons would sometimes disappear when you grab new weapons
- Avatar lipsyncing should now be working as intended
- Issue with Billy bobs animation not rendering correctly

- Voice chat issues fixed
- Crashing/Black screen at the end of a multiplayer level is now fixed
- Meta Avatar and weapons invisibility issues fixed
- Meta Avatar animation optimisation and smoothness improvements

A new update is here for Drop Dead featuring the brand new meta avatars for co-op horde!

New additions:

- Brand new meta avatars for horde mode
- Improved reloading tutorial and activation points
- Update to the latest Oculus version
- Added new multiplayer analytics to track desync events

Bug fixes:

- Fixed an issue where hand tracking could be lost
- Held weapons no longer disappear when opening the dashboard
- Fixed an issue where the application could crash when recording

Thanks again for your incredible support. We hope you enjoy our latest update.

Connect with other players and the team on our Discord community at Pixeltoys.com/discord

Added a notification message about the issue affecting Multiplayer invites. 

Known issues:
- Cannot invite friends. The latest Oculus Firmware update appears to not be working well with Drop Dead, were hoping to address this soon.
One possible workaround is to coordinate with your friend and press Quick Match at the same time.

Drop Dead - Deadly Defense Hot Fix

Howdy, agents! We’ve just released an update to patch some of the issues reported by the community in our latest update. Thank you for your patience!

Patch Notes:

Fixes:
Fixed the Last Showdown level failing to load, causing a black screen
Fixed an edge case where if a user leaves the game, the repeater cannot be killed
Fixed an issue where an Invisible zombie could sometimes hit the player from below the platform
A bug causing the reloading beeping sound to loop endlessly has been fixed
A bug causing Avatars to display incorrectly has been fixed

Join the community
Pixeltoys.com/discord

Patch Notes:

What’s new?
Brand new Deadly Defense game mode added
New Deadly Defense map Graveyard at Dusk
Added improved gun tracking to make reloading easier
Added left handed gun ammo visuals for left handed players

Bug Fixes:
Fixed an issue where the game wasn’t prompting microphone permissions
Fixed an issue where zombies would sometimes become out of sync in multiplayer and not appear on all players screens
Fixed an issue where players would lose the ability to pick up guns in multiplayer when opening the Oculus menu

Coming up next:

We’re aware of an issue that is causing avatars to display incorrectly, this will be fixed in our coming hotfix update.
We’re aware of an issue that sometimes causes players to hear a beeping audio sound, this will be fixed in our coming hotfix update.

A brand new quality of life update to Drop Dead is here, this update focuses on addressing some widely reported issues on the title:

- We’ve fixed Oculus party voices sometimes being suppressed causing you not to be able to hear your friend.
- Fixed an issue that required an internet connection to play the game
- Fixed avatar mouth syncing
- Fixed an issue where players sometimes experience beeping or static sound in Multiplayer matches
- Upgraded to the latest versions of both Oculus and Unity which should see some performance gains on all devices
- Fixed many other smaller issues called out in customer reviews

Known Issues:

- We're aware of an issue causing Oculus avatars to appear incorrectly in Multiplayer

What’s next?

Development for Drop Dead is in full swing once again and the team is cooking up something brand new for Multiplayer to scratch that itch for more Z slaying action. Keep your eyes, ears and VR set open, the update will arrive soon.
Drop Dead SDK 17
RC8
Drop Dead 1.3.5 RC1

Agents,

We’re thrilled to announce another patch for Drop Dead: Dual Strike! 

Our main focus this time was to improve the overall performance of the game, alongside some visual quality tweaks, so you should find the game runs a lot smoother for you now.

We’ve also resolved some audio issues that were highlighted to us by the community. The missing visor voice and sound effects have been restored.

We’ve also resolved some outstanding issues with the leaderboard, and some enemy collision and pathing issues.

As always, thank you for your feedback on Drop Dead: Dual Strike!

Drop Dead 1.3.2

Expressive avatars. Dual Strike now supports Oculus’ new expressive avatars! This means that in multiplayer, we now support lipsyncing and eye tracking for the multiplayer avatars.

Improved reloading. It is now easier to trigger reloads. Make sure when you lower the gun that it is pointed towards the ground

Increased game guardian boundaries. You can move further in all directions, without hitting the edge of your guardian setup.

Picking up and throwing item control improvements. We have reworked our item pickup and throwing logic, these actions should be a lot more forgiving now.

General performance and visual improvement. We’ve worked hard on further optimising Dual Strike for Rift and Quest. Not only does the game perform better, but it also looks better too! 

Bug Fixes. We’ve also squashed lots of bugs that we’ve discovered and the community highlighted to us.

Thanks for your continued support,
Pixel Toys Team
Drop Dead RC15
Drop Dead RC13
Drop Dead RC8
